TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Annotation extends System.Object implements class System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable
Public NotInheritable Class Annotation Implements IXmlSerializable

summary.span: 表示 Microsoft Annotations Framework 中的用户批注。

span.span: Represents a user annotation in the Microsoft Annotations Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示一个批注，其中包含所有关联的定位和内容数据。 represents a single annotation with all associated anchoring and content data. 批注包含以下主要元素。An annotation consists of the following main elements. - 零个、一个或多个 用于标识批注内容。Zero, one, or more that identify what is being annotated. - 零个、一个或多个 ，其中包含批注的用户数据。Zero, one, or more that contain the user data for the annotation. - 零个、一个或多个定义批注创建者的 。Zero, one, or more that define who created the annotation. - 一个 ，它指定创建批注的日期和时间。A that specifies the date and time when the annotation was created. - 指定上次更新批注的时间的 。A that specifies when the annotation was last updated. - 唯一的批注 （全局唯一标识符（GUID））。A unique annotation (a globally unique identifier (GUID)).

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 此构造函数支持 Windows Presentation Foundation 基础结构，且不应在代码中直接使用。

span.span: This constructor supports the Windows Presentation Foundation infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 应用程序不应使用无参数的无参数构造函数-无参数构造函数不会完全初始化实例。Applications should not use the parameterless constructor without parameters-the parameterless constructor does not fully initialize the instance. 若要创建新的 应用程序应使用基于参数的构造函数之一。To create a new applications should use one of the parameter-based constructors.

summary.span: 此构造函数支持 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 基础结构，且不应在代码中直接使用。

span.span: This constructor supports the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数由 WPF 序列化基础结构使用，不应在一般情况下直接使用。This constructor is used by the WPF serialization infrastructure and should not be used directly under ordinary circumstances.

summary.span: 在批注 的列表中添加、移除或修改定位点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an anchor is added, removed, or modified in the list of annotation .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了添加或删除定位点之外，在对定位点细则进行任何修改（如对 的更改）时，都将发生 。In addition to when an anchor is added or removed, occurs on any modifications to an anchor subpart, such as a change to a .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Anchors As Collection(Of AnnotationResource)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取零个或多个可定义所批注的数据选择的 定位点元素的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of zero or more anchor elements that define the data selection(s) being annotated.

value.span: 零个或多个 定位点元素的集合。

span.span: A collection of zero or more anchor elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的每个 都标识批注绑定到的数据选择（也就是说，"要批注的数据选择"）。Each in the collection identifies a data selection to which the annotation is bound (in other words, "the data selection that is being annotated"). 尽管大多数批注都引用单个数据选择并且只包含一个定位点 ，但如果单个批注引用多个数据选择，则可能会出现多个定位点。While most annotations refer to a single data selection and contain just one anchor , multiple anchors can occur if a single annotation refers to multiple data selections. 返回 集合不为 null;但是，集合可以包含零个元素。The returned collection is never null; however, the collection may contain zero elements.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AnnotationType As XmlQualifiedName
public: property System::Xml::XmlQualifiedName ^ AnnotationType { System::Xml::XmlQualifiedName ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the of the annotation type.

value.span: 此类批注的 XML 限定名。

span.span: The XML qualified name for this kind of annotation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的批注类型是作为参数传递给 构造函数的 名称。The returned annotation type is the name passed as a parameter to the constructor. > [!NOTE] > 如果通过使用不带参数的无参数构造函数正确构造批注， 将返回 `null`。 returns `null` if the annotation was incorrectly constructed by using a parameterless constructor without parameters. （没有参数的无参数构造函数不会完全初始化实例，只能与 XML 序列化一起使用。） 若要创建新的批注，应用程序应使用采用 作为参数的 构造函数。(The parameterless constructor without parameters does not fully initialize the instance and is used only internally in combination with XML serialization.) To create a new annotation, applications should use the constructor that takes an as a parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了添加或删除货物时，对货物细则的任何修改都将出现 ，如对货物的 集合中的 进行更改。In addition to when a cargo is added or removed, occurs on any modification to a cargo subpart, such as a change to an in the collection of a cargo.

span.span: A collection of zero or more cargo elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的每个 都包含批注的用户定义数据。Each in the collection contains user-defined data for the annotation. 返回 集合不为 null;但是，如果没有用于批注的用户数据，则集合可能包含零个元素。The returned collection is never null; however, the collection may contain zero elements if there is no user data for the annotation.
